pr_title: KEYCLOAK-14234 KEYCLOAK-13666 support for running adapter tests with different hostnames for auth and app servers

timeline.bodyText: Just to double check. Is this change intentional? Seems a bit suspicious to me. :)
timeline.author: vmuzikar

replies.bodyText: I removed it because the login method is using clickLink() function to log in, so any wait after this should not be necessary. But I can revert it if you want.
replies.author: mhajas

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the explanation. No need to revert. ;)
replies.author: vmuzikar

timeline.bodyText: I think we can remove this test completely now that we we run all SAML tests with different hostnames + SSL.
timeline.author: vmuzikar

replies.bodyText: I was thinking about this, but I was not sure. This test is running with different host even in the case when no app.server.host is configured. But you are probably right in this case, it is not useful at all, as in pipeline this test will be running with htmlunit, not chrome, and the auth server is running on localhost. So I will remove it.
replies.author: mhajas

timeline.bodyText: Just a nitpick. :) Should we use ServletTestUtils.APP_SERVER_HOST instead?
timeline.author: vmuzikar

timeline.bodyText: This TODO becomes irrelevant after these changes, right?
timeline.author: vramik
